Class ChatServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ChatServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    ChatServer runs in a separate thread. Open socket and wait for client connection. When a client connects, ask for screen name. Check screen name duplicated. If yes, return NAMEDUPPLICATED code. If not, return NAMEACCEPTED code and start new thread to listen client message When receive MESSAGE, populate message to all clients when receive QUIT, disconnect client.
    Author:
    Derek Luong
